product_name: NEMO Cosmo Insulated Air Sleeping Pad
long_description: The NEMO Cosmo(TM) Insulated Air Sleeping Pad has a built-in foot pump for quick inflation plus 3 in. of thickness and a layer of PrimaLoft(R) for a warm night's sleep while backpacking. Pad features 3 in. baffled air chambers that evenly distribute weight; horizontal baffles create a flat sleeping surface and eliminate any bouncy feel. A layer of PrimaLoft(R) synthetic insulation inside the pad reduces heat loss to keep you warm on cold nights. Give your lungs a break and use the built-in foot pump at the end of the pad to inflate the pad quickly and easily. Dual valves provide maximum airflow for rapid inflation; valve on the underside opens for quick deflation. Pillow baffle at the head area supports your head and adds no weight to the pad. 75-denier polyester fabric resists puncture while keeping the weight down. NEMO Cosmo Insulated Air Sleeping Pad includes a stuff sack, compression strap and repair kit.
short_description: The NEMO Cosmo(TM) Insulated Air Sleeping Pad has a built-in foot pump for quick inflation plus 3 in. of thickness and a layer of PrimaLoft(R) for a warm night's sleep while backpacking.
